faqs.question: What are your business hours?
faqs.answer: We operate 24/7 with our AI assistant, and human support is available Monday-Friday, 9 AM - 6 PM EST.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, AmEx), PayPal, and wire transfers for enterprise clients.

faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all subscriptions. No questions asked.

policies.shipping: All digital services are available immediately upon purchase.
policies.refunds: Full refund within 30 days of purchase.
policies.privacy: We never share customer data with third parties.
